body_html: @fritzo I am extremely sorry about the inconvenience caused. There was a minor bug in the rsample method (I forgot to divide by self.alpha), which led to these issues. The current builds should pass, since I built in on my machine on the right branch (I was building on a different branch earlier, hence no error popped up).

body: @fritzo I am extremely sorry about the inconvenience caused. There was a minor bug in the `rsample` method (I forgot to divide by `self.alpha`), which led to these issues. The current builds should pass, since I built in on my machine on the right branch (I was building on a different branch earlier, hence no error popped up).
